SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.structurearchetypes

Interface IPerpetualMover

All Superinterfaces:
IStructureConst
All Known Implementing Classes:
Clock, Flag, RevolvingDoor, Windmill
public interface IPerpetualMover extends IStructureConst
Represents structures that can move perpetually. For example, windmills and flags.

  • Method Details

    • setOpen

      void setOpen(boolean bool)
      Changes the open-status of this structure. True if open, False if closed.
      Parameters:
      bool - The new open-status of the structure.

    • setLocked

      void setLocked(boolean locked)
      Changes the lock status of this structure. Locked structures cannot be opened.
      Parameters:
      locked - New lock status.

    • setName

      void setName(String name)
      Changes the name of the structure.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of this structure.

    • setOpenDir

      void setOpenDir(MovementDirection openDirection)
      Sets the MovementDirection this AbstractStructure will open if currently closed.

      Note that if it's currently in the open status, it is supposed go in the opposite direction, as the closing direction is the opposite of the opening direction.

      Parameters:
      openDirection - The MovementDirection this AbstractStructure will open in.

    • setPowerBlock

      void setPowerBlock(Vector3Di pos)
      Updates the position of the powerblock.
      Parameters:
      pos - The new position.

    • setRotationPoint

      void setRotationPoint(Vector3Di pos)
      Updates the position of the rotation point.
      Parameters:
      pos - The new position.

    • setCoordinates

      default void setCoordinates(Vector3Di posA, Vector3Di posB)
      Changes the position of this AbstractStructure. The min/max order of the positions does not matter.
      Parameters:
      posA - The first new position.
      posB - The second new position.

    • setCoordinates

      void setCoordinates(Cuboid newCuboid)
      Changes the position of this AbstractStructure. The min/max order of the positions doesn't matter.
      Parameters:
      newCuboid - The Cuboid representing the area the structure will take up from now on.
